sys_remote_update_set.description:
From: "Ciano, Joseph" <JCiano@verisk.com> Date: Tuesday, December 22, 2015 at 7:04 AM To: "Longsjo, Jason" <jmlongsjo@verisk.com>, Hardik Vora <hjvora@verisk.com> Subject: Distribution List Short Description
Good Morning Fella's,
AS we are now taking over DL's administration from Security I noticed that the request item was moved out of the Security Service Catalog into the IT Catalog. Not sure who made the move but I was not told of this and users called asking where the request item is. All in all we were able to find it and I advised the team of the move.
Can we update the short description? Take out Security Support and just leave Distribution List Request? Is this something I can do and if so how? In Service Desk I was able to update items and I'm always willing to help you guys. Thanks!
Joseph Ciano | Service Desk - Help Desk
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Update Distribution List Task Desc
